node.address: Calle 20n#6an-44, Santa Monica Residencial , Cali, Colombia

content.value:
Welcome to Cali, welcome to The Pelican Larry!

There’s plenty of communal space to get inspired, dream, meet, share & connect. An entertainment living room, fully-equipped kitchen, communal table, games, a huge garden area for relaxing, hammocks, the place is yours during your stay!

-FREE BUFFET BREAKFAST (8am – 10 am): Eggs, Bread, Fruits, Vegetables, Butter, Jam, Milk, Coffee, Tea Bag.
-FREE SALSA LESSONS: Monday to Friday
-DANCE STUDIO FOR PRIVATE SALSA CLASSES
-SPANISH LESSON SERVICE
-NETFLIX ROOM
-TV ROOM WITH CABLE CHANNELS
-FREE WIFI IN ALL HOSTEL
-FREE TOWEL
-LAUNDRY SERVICE (with charge)
-24 HOURS RECEPTION
-FREE WALKING TOUR EVERY DAY
-HOT SHOWER
-FREE PARKING
-POOL TABLE
-AIR HOCKEY
-PING – PONG

Decorated with tiled floors and contemporary paintings, rooms at Hostel Pelican Larry are very bright. Some of them have private bathrooms.
Guests can cook their own meals in the common kitchen.
There is a living room featuring a TV set. Hostel Pelican Larry is a 30-minute walk from the zoo. Mio bus station is 200 m away, whereas the airport is 30 minutes away by car.

description.description: The Pelican Larry Hostel opened in 2008 and is located in Granada, one of the best and safest neighborhood of Cali, perfect location for visitors with walking distance from the City Bus Terminal, MIO Bus Station, Chipichape Mall, the downtown, many restaurants and bars area, clubs, supermarkets and more!
